main event: On September 8, 1960, a civilian witness and his family observed a lighted, disc-shaped object maneuvering in the sky near Winchester Bay, Oregon.
interesting points: The object was larger than a star but smaller than an airliner,The object hovered, moved slowly, and made abrupt changes in direction,The sighting lasted for about 10-15 minutes,The skies were clear with no clouds during the observation,The investigation found no conclusive explanation for the sighting.
witness description: a civilian witness and his family
